name: Asparagus And Mushrooms With Fresh Coriander
keywords: asparagus, coriander, mushroom, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound fresh asparagus spears, trimmed of woody sections and scraped
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the asparagus spears on the diagonal into one-inch pieces.

Heat the olive oil in a nonstick frying pan. Add the mushrooms and saute over over high heat, tossing, until the mushrooms are lightly browned. Add the asparagus pieces. Cook, stirring and tossing, for about a minute. Add the shallots, salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the coriander. Cook for 30 seconds and serve.
